question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: Liquidity Adjustment Facility operates through daily repo and reverse repo auctions
option2: National Housing Bank can lend money to small scale industries towards their working capital
option3: Board for financial supervision is empowered to supervise primary dealers in India
option4: Norms for classifying assets of banks into standard and sub-standard categories are prescribed by RBI
answer: National Housing Bank can lend money to small scale industries towards their working capital
